metadata.feature_description: Automatically generate and display table of contents for articles

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module and click Create article
steps.expected: Create article dialog should open with TOC checkbox
steps.actual: Create article dialog opened with 'Display a Table of Contents:' checkbox visible and checked by default

steps.action: Verify TOC checkbox is present and enabled in create article dialog
steps.expected: TOC checkbox should be visible and checked by default
steps.actual: TOC checkbox was visible, labeled 'Display a Table of Contents:', and checked by default

steps.action: Create article with HTML content containing h2, h3, and h4 headings
steps.expected: Article should be created with hierarchical heading structure
steps.actual: Article created with headings: Introduction (h2), Main Section (h2), Subsection One (h3), Subsection Two (h3), Nested Topic (h4), Conclusion (h2)

steps.action: Publish article and view the generated Table of Contents
steps.expected: TOC should be automatically generated from the headings
steps.actual: TOC was automatically generated and displayed in sidebar with hierarchical structure matching the headings

steps.action: Verify TOC displays correct hierarchical structure
steps.expected: TOC should show nested headings: h2 at level 1, h3 as sub-items, h4 as sub-sub-items
steps.actual: TOC correctly displayed hierarchical structure: 1. Introduction, 2. Main Section (i. Subsection One, ii. Subsection Two (a. Nested Topic)), 3. Conclusion

observations: The 'Display a Table of Contents' checkbox is enabled by default when creating new articles
TOC is generated automatically from h2, h3, and h4 HTML headings in article content
The TOC uses numbered/lettered formatting: h2 headings use numbers (1, 2, 3), h3 headings use roman numerals (i, ii), h4 headings use letters (a, b)
TOC is displayed in the sidebar under 'Contents' heading when viewing the article
The TableOfContentsController.cs parses headings using HtmlAgilityPack and builds a SectionNode tree structure
